statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections;
SELECT influencer_name, posts_count FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections WHERE social_media_platform='Twitter';
SELECT influencer_name, post_engagement FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections ORDER BY post_engagement DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections WHERE agency_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT influencer_name, posts_count FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections WHERE post_engagement > 10000;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections WHERE agency_id = '7fdbb1cf-4769-4074-818a-7a7c9b007c8d' AND posts_count > 100 ORDER BY post_engagement DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT social_media_platform, influencer_name, post_engagement FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections WHERE post_engagement > 500 ORDER BY social_media_platform, influencer_name DESC;
SELECT election_id, social_media_platform, influencer_name FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections WHERE posts_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY election_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(post_engagement) AS avg_engagement FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(post_engagement) AS total_engagement FROM SocialMediaInfluenceOnElections GROUP BY influencer_name HAVING total_engagement > 1000 ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_platform;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platform WHERE platform_type = 'Twitter';
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_handle, followers_count FROM election_influencers WHERE followers_count > 100000;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_handle FROM election_influencers WHERE platform_id = 2 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT platform_name, COUNT(*) AS total_influencers FROM social_media_platform INNER JOIN election_influencers ON social_media_platform.platform_id = election_influencers.platform_id GROUP BY platform_name;
SELECT * FROM social_media_platform WHERE platform_type = 'Twitter';
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_handle, followers_count FROM election_influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT platform_name, COUNT(*) as influencers_count FROM social_media_platform LEFT JOIN election_influencers ON social_media_platform.platform_id = election_influencers.platform_id GROUP BY platform_name;

SELECT platform_name, platform_type, SUM(followers_count) as total_followers FROM social_media_platform JOIN election_influencers ON social_media_platform.platform_id = election_influencers.platform_id GROUP BY platform_name, platform_type;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_handle, posts_count FROM election_influencers WHERE posts_count < 50 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM socialmedia_influence
SELECT election_date, election_name, winning_party FROM elections
SELECT headquarters_location, agency_name FROM government_agencies
SELECT social_media_platform, influence_score FROM socialmedia_influence ORDER BY influence_score DESC
SELECT agency_name, headquarters_location FROM government_agencies WHERE id = 2
SELECT election_name, election_date, winning_party FROM elections
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE headquarters_location = 'Washington'
SELECT influence_score, social_media_platform FROM socialmedia_influence ORDER BY influence_score DESC
SELECT election_name, winning_party FROM elections WHERE election_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM socialmedia_influence JOIN elections ON socialmedia_influence.election_id = elections.id
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM government_agencies;
SELECT account_name, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_name, posts_count FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM election_data WHERE election_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, agency_id FROM government_agencies ORDER BY agency_id DESC;
SELECT election_name, election_date FROM election_data WHERE election_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_name, followers_count, posts_count FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY posts_count DESC;

SELECT s.account_name, e.election_name, si.influence_score FROM social_media_accounts s JOIN social_media_influence si ON s.account_id = si.account_id JOIN election_data e ON si.election_id = e.election_id;
SELECT * FROM Government_Agencies;
SELECT agency_name, agency_type FROM Government_Agencies WHERE agency_type = 'State';
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM Social_Media_Platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Elections WHERE election_year = 2020;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Government_Agencies WHERE agency_type = 'Federal';
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM Social_Media_Platforms ORDER BY platform_type DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE platform_id = 1 AND agency_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(election_year) AS latest_election_year FROM Elections;
SELECT DISTINCT agency_type FROM Government_Agencies;
